text:
Reads ValueRangeRecord for charts and enables to set basic axis options(values range):
-minimal value
-maximal value
-major unit
-minor unit


this patch contain my previous patch
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=49242
creator: peter.kutak@microstep-mis.com

text:
Thanks for this, applied to svn in r948080.

Any chance you could knock up a quick unit test for these two when you have a minute? It probably just needs to work on a chart, check the right things are there, change something, save + reload and ensure the change was taken
creator: apache@gagravarr.org

text: Seems we are not getting a unit-test submitted as part of this bug any more...
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
